walletRefund.title: Add Funds to Wallet
walletRefund.description: Request to add funds to your wallet balance
walletRefund.referenceCodeGenerated: Your reference code has been generated

instructions.title: Next Steps
instructions.step1: Use the reference code above for your bank transfer
instructions.step2: Complete the bank transfer with the specified amount
instructions.step3: Click 'Confirm Payment' and upload your receipt

walletRefund.instructionsText:
1. Use the reference code above for your bank transfer
2. Complete the bank transfer with the specified amount
3. After transfer, click 'Confirm Payment' and upload your receipt
4. Send the receipt via WhatsApp to the admin
5. Wait for admin verification and approval
walletRefund.uploadReceiptDescription: Upload your bank transfer receipt to confirm the payment
walletRefund.clickToUploadReceipt: Click to upload receipt (JPG, PNG, WebP, or PDF)
walletRefund.whatsappRedirectMessage: After uploading the receipt, you will be redirected to WhatsApp to send it to the admin.
walletRefund.receiptRequired: Receipt is required to confirm payment
walletRefund.waitingForAdmin: Waiting for admin to activate the fund
